import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; function CartProduct({ item, removeItem, updatedQuantity, updateSubtotal }) { function dec() { return updatedQuantity(item.id, item.quantity - 1); } return (

{item.title}

${item.price}

{item.quantity}

$ {item.subtotal.toFixed(2)}

); } export default CartProduct;
